channel.title: CVE Feed for Network Optix -- NxCloud
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Network Optix -- NxCloud

item.title: CVE-2023-6263|2024-08-02T08:28:20.362Z -- network%20optix -- nxcloud
item.description: An issue was discovered by IPVM team in Network Optix NxCloud before 23.1.0.40440. It was possible to add a fake VMS server to NxCloud by using the exact identification of a legitimate VMS server. As result, it was possible to retrieve authorization headers from legitimate users when the legitimate client connects to the fake VMS server.
